game.name: VEIN
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Adjustable Text Size, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: VEIN은 포스트 아포칼립스 세계를 배경으로 한 생존 멀티플레이어 샌드박스 게임입니다. 생존을 위해 자원을 모으고, 폐허가 된 건물을 탐험하며, 집을 방어하고, 혼자든 친구와 함께든 사회를 재건하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: VEIN is a post-apocalyptic survival multiplayer sandbox game. Gather supplies to survive, explore abandoned buildings, defend your home, and rebuild society, whether alone or with friends.

reviewHighlights.text: Was scavenging for an Axe. My stress level started rising. Said I needed to use Alcohol or Anti-depressants to make it go down. Took the Anti-depressa...
I'm going to be honest, I was very critical of this game for the first hour or so. It has that Early Access quirks that you expect: weird AI/animation...
